title: Management: Tasks, Responsibilities, Practices
description: This is a special khaki colored faux leather covered edition that was reprinted by agreement with Harper & Row, New York and William Heinemann London. It was printed in Switzerland for "Management Editions (Europe) Dirmas S.A. Geneva Switzerland". Slight Creasing to leather. Slight shelf wear with tiny indentations to front leather cover. Tiny scrape to spine. Small crease to leather at spine. Pages are clean, crisp and binding is tight. Solid Book.
author: Peter F. Drucker
